derivation: from a compound of G2596 (κατόρθωμα) and a derivative of G3717 (κατόρθωμα) (compare G1357 (κατόρθωμα));
strongs_def: something made fully upright, i.e. (figuratively) rectification (specially, good public administration)
outline:
1. a right action, a successful achievement
    1. of wholesome public measures or institutions
